projects.title: Heatmap
projects.description: A heatmap made in D3js displaying variations in global temperatures over time.

projects.title: Scatterplot
projects.description: A couple of scatterplots made in D3js that show the top grossing movings and the highest return on investment per genre.

projects.title: Histogram
projects.description: A chart made in D3js showing the difference between the increase in productivity versus the increase in wages over the last 50 years.

projects.title: Quote Generator
projects.description: Press the button to get a new quote selected randomly from a treasure chest of wisdom!

projects.title: Forecast App
projects.description: Get the weather in your location, along with a 7 day forecast.

projects.title: TwitchTV Viewer
projects.description: Monitor the current online state of your favorite Twitch.tv streamers. Combines observable streams from various sources.

projects.title: Force Directed Graph
projects.description: A semi-interactive, force-directed graph made in D3js showing the countries of the world as connected by land borders

projects.title: Recipe Box
projects.description: Create and view recipes.  Store them in your browser!

projects.title: Wikipedia Viewer
projects.description: Search Wikipedia and get links to articles. A simple application of observable streams.

projects.title: Timestamp Microservice
projects.description: A simple API that transforms natural language time strings into Unix epoch format, and visa-versa.

projects.title: Request Header Parser
projects.description: Send a GET request to receive request header metadata in JSON format.

projects.title: URL Shortener
projects.description: Send a URL to receive a unique, shortened link. Send the link to be sent to the original location.

projects.title: File Metadata Microservice
projects.description: Upload a file to receive the filesize.

projects.title: Markdown Previewer
projects.description: Write in Github-flavored Markdown and see a real time preview of the result. Includes syntax highlighting!

projects.title: Image Search Abstraction Layer
projects.description: An API that abstracts Flickr searchers into more terse GET requests.

projects.title: freeCodeCamp Leaderboard
projects.description: See who's leading the freeCodeCamp community in points, either by completing challenges or helping out in the chat!

projects.title: Game of Life
projects.description: An implementation of Conway's Game of Life.

projects.title: Meteorite Strike Map
projects.description: A map of meteorite strikes around the world, with their imapct sizes visualized.
